original_solution_mapping.L1: The length of the box is 3 x the height of 12 inches = <<3*12=36>>36 inches.
original_solution_mapping.L2: The width of the box is 36 inches / 4 = <<36/4=9>>9 inches.
original_solution_mapping.L3: The volume of the box is the height of 12 inches x the length of 36 inches x the width of 9 inches = <<12*36*9=3888>>3,888 cubic inches.

original_function_code:
def solve():
    """Index: 988.
    Returns: the volume of the box.
    """
    # L1
    height = 12 # 12 inches in height
    length_multiplier = 3 # 3 times its height
    length = length_multiplier * height

    # L2
    width_divisor = 4 # 4 times its width
    width = length / width_divisor

    # L3
    volume = height * length * width

    # FA
    answer = volume
    return answer

logical_steps.solution_line_template: The length of the box is {length_multiplier} x the height of {height} inches = <<{length_multiplier}*{height}={length}>>{length} inches.
The width of the box is {length} inches / {width_divisor} = <<{length}/{width_divisor}={width}>>{width} inches.
The volume of the box is the height of {height} inches x the length of {length} inches x the width of {width} inches = <<{height}*{length}*{width}={volume}>>{volume} cubic inches.
